metadata.title: CVE-2017-15045 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: LAME 3.99, 3.99.1, 3.99.2, 3.99.3, 3.99.4, 3.99.5, 3.98.4, 3.98.2 and 3.98has a heap-based buffer over-read in fill_buffer in libmp3lame/util.c,related to lame_encode_buffer_sample_t in libmp3lame/lame.c, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2017-9410.

criterions.comment: lame: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
